name: Ring is Dead
description:
"RING IS DEAD" is a vocaloid fan game about cancelled, private, and controversial vocal synth characters from the vocaloid and related communities.

The plot centers around Ring Suzune, who has just woken up from a seven year coma to find she is considered dead and her friend, Lui Hibiki, is missing. Now, Ring is on a quest to find out what happened and if she is alone.

Warning: This game features flashing lights.
